contents: Article 5 (Sponsorship Holder) ① Sponsorship holders may provide cash, goods, services, etc. to the Sports Association and use marketing assets for advertising and publicity within the scope and manner determined by the contract. ② In accordance with the TOP program contract signed with the IOC, the Sports Council considers companies participating in the IOC's TOP program as sponsors and grants them status and rights accordingly. Revised on June 16, 2022. ③ Sponsorship rights holders are divided into TOP, 1st grade, 2nd grade, and 3rd grade, and the details of sponsorship rights for each grade are subject to individual contracts. Newly established 2022. 6. 16.
